title: 2015 Countdown Problem #4: Find the Largest - Part I
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Which of the following is the largest?"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt{2^{11}\sqrt{2^{11}\sqrt{2^{11}\sqrt{2^{11}\sqrt{...}}}}}-"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sqrt{33\sqrt{33\sqrt{33\sqrt{33\sqrt{...}}}}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"B. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{1}{2}+\frac{1}{1+2014^{-2014}}+\frac{1}{1+2013^{-2013}}+\frac{1}{1+2012^{-2012}}+..."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+\frac{1}{1+2012^{2012}}+\frac{1}{1+2013^{2013}}+\frac{1}{1+2014^{2014}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"C. "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1008\times(1-\frac{1}{2^{2}})^{-1}\times(1-\frac{1}{3^{2}})^{-1}\times(1-\frac{1}{4^{2}})^{-1}..."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(1-\frac{1}{2013^{2}})^{-1}\times(1-\frac{1}{2014^{2}})^{-1}\times(1-\frac{1}{2015^{2}})^{-1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This problem is part of the set 2015 Countdown Problems.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"blockquote","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For (a):","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y=\sqrt{ky}\rightarrow y^2=ky"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"y=k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (reject y=0)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Value = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2^{11}-33 = 2015"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"blockquote","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For (b):","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{1}{(1+\frac{1}{k^n})}+\frac{1}{(1+k^n)}=\frac{k^n}{(k^n+1)}+\frac{1}{(1+k^n)}=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"hence the sum is independent of both k and n."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Note the lone term "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{1}{1+(2012)^0}=\frac{1}{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in the series is not part of any pair."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Sum = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{1}{2}+2014×1+\frac{1}{2} = 2015"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"blockquote","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For (c):","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(1-\frac{1}{k^2})^{-1}=(\frac{(k+1)(k-1)}{k^2})^{-1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=\frac{k^2}{(k+1)(k-1)} =\frac{k}{(k+1)}×\frac{k}{(k-1)}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1008(1-\frac{1}{{2}^2} )^{-1} (1-\frac{1}{{3}^2})^{-1}…(1-\frac{1}{{2014}^2})^{-1} (1-\frac{1}{{2015}^2})^{-1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=1008(\frac{2}{3}×\frac{2}{1})(\frac{3}{4}×\frac{3}{2})…(\frac{2014}{2015}×\frac{2014}{2013})(\frac{2015}{2016}×\frac{2015}{2014})"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=1008(\frac{2}{3}×\frac{3}{4}×…×\frac{2014}{2015}×\frac{2015}{2016})(\frac{2}{1}×\frac{3}{2}×…×\frac{2014}{2013}×\frac{2015}{2014})"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=1008(\frac{2}{2016})(2015)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=2015"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Note: for B, I was unsure if by your series that if "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{1}{1+0^{0}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" was going to be part of your summation, it would be great to clarify (although the option can be solved just from figuring out A=C)

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

title: 2015 Countdown Problem #5: Multiplication Madness

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Each product is a factor of the final product. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"First we look at if the answer is positive or negative. 
Positive factors always have a positive product. The first two products are positive. 
An odd number of negative factors have a negative product, and the reverse is also true. Hence 2017 negative numbers have a negative product and 2018 negative numbers have a positive product. Since an odd number of negative factors have a negative product, and there is only one negative factor, the answer must be negative. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Then we find out if the answer is odd or even. Out of the four products, three are odd and one is even. Since one factor is even, the answer must be even. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence the answer is a negative even number. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Sorry if I used too many words."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 2015 Countdown Problem #6: Summing Up The Years - Revisited
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/solvable/830a6063be.7196b5875f.XojhBm.png?width=250"}},{"type":"text","text":"
Last year I've posted the following problem "},{"type":"text","text":"(Summing up the Years)","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" which has been reshared on Brilliant's official Facebook page, and this year I've decided to introduce a twist to this deceptively simple problem:"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find the last digit of
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \sum_{i=0}^{2015} ( ((2015^{i})^{i}) (i^{2015}) ) "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This problem is part of the set 2015 Countdown Problems.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For the term "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i=0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i^{2005}=0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", so that term can be ignored.  Every term other than the term we can ignore is divisible by 5."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is odd if and only if "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is odd, and multiplying by an odd number doesn't change its parity.  Therefore, every odd term is odd and all other terms are even.  There are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{2015+1}{2}=1008"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" odd terms, so their sum is even, so the entire sum is even."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore the entire sum is divisible by 5 and even, so it is divisible by 10, so its last digit is 0."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The original problem is "},{"type":"text","text":"here","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]},{"type":"text","text":" for those who haven't seen it yet"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"blockquote","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
  "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Solution:","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Note that for any integer "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i>0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the last digit of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{(2015)}^i"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = the last digit of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5^i"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=5. Hence the last digit of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"{(2015)}^i"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=5, simplifying the sun to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5\sum_{i=1}^{2015} {i^{2015}}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" . It can be further simplified to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5\sum_{i=1}^{2015} {(last-digit-of-i)}^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"For "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0≤i≤9"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the last digits of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i^k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an integer are tabulated below (note the pattern):"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"table","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"7"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"7","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"tableRow","content":[{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^4"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6"}]},{"type":"tableCell","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"
"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"|| "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x^5"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" || 1 || 2 || 3 || 4 || 5 || 6 || 7 || 8 || 9 || "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Note that 2015=3 (mod 4)=1 (mod 2)=5 (mod 10). Hence,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=0 (mod 10),"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=1 (mod 10),"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=2^{3 (mod 4)}=8 (mod 10),"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=3^{3 (mod 4)}=7 (mod 10),"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"4^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=4^{1 (mod 2)}=4 (mod 10),"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=5 (mod 10),"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"6^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=6 (mod 10),"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"7^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=7^{3 (mod 4)}=3 (mod 10),"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"8^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=8^{3 (mod 4)}=2 (mod 10), and"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"9^{2015}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"=9^{1 (mod 2)}=9 (mod 10). "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore, the last digit"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=5(\frac{2010}{10})(0+1+8+7+4+5+6+3+2+9)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"
"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"+5(0+1+8+7+4+5)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"=45350"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" = 0 (mod 10)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
